entry.title: Explorations in Deep Learning for Recipe Generation
entry.summary: In my final two quarters as a University of Washington undergraduate, I completed a research project exploring deep learning approaches for recipe generation: a supervised learning task in which a model generates instructions for preparing a dish given a title and list of ingredients.
entry.content:
In my final two quarters as a University of Washington undergraduate, I completed a research project exploring deep learning approaches for recipe generation: a supervised learning task in which a model generates instructions for preparing a dish given a title and list of ingredients.

I will be adding some highlights here as I finish building this website.

A copy of my final report as submitted is available here
